typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.PubmedXMLFile
typeDescription.description: Type for Pubmed XML files that contain multiple medline citations.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.MedlineCitation
typeDescription.description: One Medline citation (i.e. XML fragment that contains title, abstract text, PMID etc.) out of a Pubmed XML File.
